thread.title: Drake Sounds Exactly Like XXXTENTACTION On This Perfect Mash-Up
thread.title_full: Drake Sounds Exactly Like XXXTENTACTION On This Perfect Mash-Up

author: Jacob Davey
title: Drake Sounds Exactly Like XXXTENTACTION On This Perfect Mash-Up
text:
The internet has duly delivered what we’ve been after for a while. SoundCloud user Tesher has delivered a perfect mash-up of Drake’s opening bars of “KMT” & XXXTENTACTION’s “Look At Men” where the 6 God’s flow sounds almost identical to incarcerated rapper X’s. Listeners have been comparing the Drizzy’s flow on the track since he performed it at an Amsterdam concert and snippets of the track emerged online .
Drake confronted these accusations in his interview with DJ Semtex, “I listened and I’m like, okay, I see where people could draw this comparison off of the first two lines, whether it be cadence or the rhyme pattern or whatever. It’s crazy that people think that after all this time, after all I’ve been through, that I’m the type of person to go and take that and make it my own. I’m not stupid, I’m not a sh*tty person like that.” Make your own judgment on the undoubted similarities in the mash-up beneath.

Listen to the original track featuring London road rap artist Giggs below.

With More Life came a fresh batch of hilarious new memes focusing on the project. Check the best of the best out here .
